actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Community Service Employment Act to exclude payments received for employment under such Act by veterans from income for purposes of determining benefit levels of non-service-connected disability pensions.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Community Service Employment Act to exclude compensation received by war veterans under such Act from income for non-service-connected disability pension purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Community Service Employment Act to exclude payments received for employment under such Act by veterans from income for purposes of determining benefit levels of non-service-connected disability pensions.
